EmailTemplate.name: Statistical Consulting Service
EmailTemplate.subject: Statistical Consulting Service - {!Contact.Name} {!Contact.Person_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Please find information and the link on statistical consulting and the link to our Statistical Support form found on our intranet.
You can read about it at: https://www.monash.edu/__data/assets/pdf_file/0008/179477/monash-statistical-consulting-platform.pdf This service is part of the technological support provided by MAXIMA (https://platforms.monash.edu/maxima/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=86&Itemid=198)
For the application form to access the service please use the following link and scroll down to the Scholarships, Award, Grant section - under Statistical Support HDR http://intranet.monash.edu.au/graduate-education/handbook-admin-forms/forms/index.html#Scholarships
Kind regards,
{!User.FirstName}
Graduate Research Services _____________________________________________ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D, 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia Phone: +61 3 990 53009 | Fax: +61 3 990 55042 Email: mge-candidature@monash.edu Website: monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
We're listeningâ€¦.your feedback helps us improve
